org.apache.taverna.server.master.worker

Class SecurityContextFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.server.master.worker.SecurityContextFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, SecurityContextFactory

    public class SecurityContextFactory
extends Object
implements SecurityContextFactory
    Singleton factory. Really is a singleton (and is also very trivial); the singleton-ness is just about limiting the number of instances of this around even when lots of serialization is going on.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows
    See Also:
    Serializable, Serialized Form

      • create

        public SecurityContextDelegate create(TavernaRun run,
                                      UsernamePrincipal owner)
                               throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: SecurityContextFactory
        Creates a security context.
        Specified by:
        create in interface SecurityContextFactory
        Parameters:
        run - Handle to remote run. Allows the security context to know how to apply itself to the workflow run.
        owner - The identity of the owner of the workflow run.
        Returns:
        The security context.
        Throws:
        Exception - If anything goes wrong.
